deck: Tim Belfrey is a young boy with a rough life. The only constant solace he has is found in the lake by his house, in the form of a fish. Witness this short story one-shot by rising stars F.D. White and Alrissa Sia!

deck: A collection of 20 black and white stories which are fairy/folk tale based.
description: 28 artists created 20 different stories to be included in Gurukitty Studios second Annual anthology project. The stories are folk/fairy tale themed and some are adaptions of existing stories while others are completely original creations. The artists come from all over the world which gives "Once Upon a Time..." a unique variety of storytelling techniques themes and ideas.

description: Throughout the cosmos, there is a term, a combination of two simple words, spoken in over 40 million dialects, which brings fear to countless living species. It is a phrase of warning, of dread, of imminent and ancient destruction. Entire civilizations have fallen under the label and disappeared from existence like a wisp of smoke. Now Earth itself has been designated by these two deadly words. Welcome to Earth, the next Bad Planet!
name: HC

deck: Meet the Weaselmeziters. Isaac, Nikola, and Bill. They're bounty hunters without a bountyâ€¦except the one that just popped up on Vornheimal, the most dangerous criminal in the galaxy! Experience the Weaselmeizters in their jaw-dropping first issue!

deck: Tony Stark sends Ghost Rider to the Italian Alps in pursuit of Dr. Octopus

description: A man discovers that his body is rapidly mutating, turning him into something beyond human. Batman must decide if he's going to let it happen or not.

description:
The 9th Century AD was a turbulent, violent time. Anglo-Saxon Britons had to fend off constant attacks from marauding and blood-thirsty Scandinavian warriors â€“ the much-feared Vikings.

Young Cedric was a Saxon â€“ brave and willing to fight to defend his village from Viking hordes. As he did so, though, he had to face an equally deadly, but more sinister, enemy from closer to home.
name: Saxon Eagles

description:
All occupied France went in fear and trembling of him â€“ ruthless SS Colonel Ludwig Bauer â€“ a monster in the guise of a man.

But one day Bauer went too far with young Commando lieutenant, Rick Matthews. And Rick stayed behind after a raid in France to teach Colonel Scarface, step by blood-stained step, what it was to be afraidâ€¦
name: Colonel Scarface

description:
After firmly putting a bully in his place with a well-aimed punch, young Thomas Markham knew he had to make himself difficult to find. He was helped by Sergeant Ned Royle who suggested joining the Royal Marines and losing himself there.

While he was now out of plain sight, young Thomas was not out of danger for he was shipped off to fight in the Crimean War. There his mettle would be tested in the heat of battle as one ofâ€¦ Royleâ€™s Marines.
name: Royle's Marines

description:
Transylvania â€“ an eerie land of legends, of werewolves and vampires, of hauntings and spine-chilling screams in the dark.

Not the most welcoming place in the world to crash-land in at dead of night â€“ especially when your Mosquito is damaged, not by Nazi ack-ackâ€¦but by a swarm of millions of large, black bats!
name: Night Of Fear

description: Sabrina the Teenage Witch has a lot of strange friends! If it's spooky and scary, it's probably been a guest in the Spellman house! Monsters, ghosts, vampires -- they're all real, and a lot friendlier than you think. This special digital exclusive book collects over 150 pages of Sabrina's most monstrous friends. For her, Halloween is every day!

description:
The shocking truth is revealed: The tomb of Aquamanâ€™s mother is empty! But thereâ€™s something sinister about this development that will change Arthurâ€™s life forever!

Maelstrom, Part 1 of 6

Dr. Shin is requested to return to Triton but instead takes a job from Arthur to along with Daniel Evans, go to Atlantis and figure out why the city isn't recognizing Arthur as it's ruler.

In Atlantis the traitors who attempted to kill Queen Mera are exiled to the Atlantic Ocean where Arthur gives them the means to start a new civilization.

Meanwhile Dr. Shim and Evans use the Touch Stones to reveal that Atlantis doesn't recognize Arthur because it doesn't recognize that Arthur's mother, Atlanna, is dead. When Arthur learns this he swim directly to her tomb, which he finds empty.
name: Maelstrom, Part 1: Afterlife

description: When catastrophe strikes Arkham Asylum, where will Gotham City house the worldâ€™s most dangerous criminals, and when inmates are found murdered, what is Batman prepared to do in search of justice? description: Hell is bursting out of Arkham Asylum, and the only being that can stop it is The Spectre â€“ but first he must stop himself from razing all of Gotham City!

Spinning out of events in BATMAN ETERNAL Selina has accepted the family mantle and embraced her true criminal side, but is Gotham City ready for her reign? And with the Cat away, whoâ€™s the stranger haunting the empty rooftops of the city? Donâ€™t miss the start of a bold new direction for Selina Kyle by the new creative team of novelist Genevieve Valentine and Garry Brown (Five Ghosts, Iron Patriot).

Harley continues with her toxic Max Macabre relationship â€“ but everything changes when Power Girl comes crashing into Coney Island from outer space! PG has a severe case of amnesia, and Harley is happy to remind her that they are best friends â€“ and a crimefighting team!
name: Power Outage

description: Following their battle against Mantis, a Boom Tube mishap forces the Forever People to find alternative transportation back to New Genesis. After getting some unexpected help from Bat Cow, they arrive home to learn that Azur Te has come to join the team â€“ and Guy Gardner has brought the Green Lantern/New Gods conflict to their doorstep!

description: Time is broken â€“ and so is the Justice League Dark! The team may have welcomed Andrew Bennett, Frankenstein, and its others back into the fold, but the reunion will be short-lived when the JLD finds itself scattered across the timestream! Theyâ€™re lost in a blasted, apocalyptic wasteland at the end of timeâ€¦ an incomprehensible dimension beyond all existenceâ€¦and at the dawn of a dark civilization lost to recorded history â€“ the place where magic was first harnessed! They can barely work together under the best of circumstancesâ€¦how will they ever find their way home from this?

description:
When they last collaborated, Grant Morrison joined artist Ben Oliver (LOBO, BATMAN/SUPERMAN) for the acclaimed ACTION COMICS #0. For their next team-up, the two superstars take a spin around the self-obsessed Earth-16 â€“ a.k.a. Earth-Me!

With all of the worldâ€™s threats having been handled long ago by their parents, the next generation of supers â€“ including Chris Kent, Damian Wayne, Alexis Luthor, Offspring, Megamorpho, Donna Troy and more â€“ find themselves labeled as superstars more often than super heroes. But with that fame comes complacency, and when a massive threat unlike anything theyâ€™ve ever seen surfaces, this pampered crew finds themselves in way over their head. What secret is Damien keeping from Chris that could tear the worldâ€™s finest friends apart? Who is the mysterious killer lurking behind the scenes among these spoiled super-children? And what chance do they stand against the monstrous villain thatâ€™s murdering its way cross the Multiverse? All that and more in this exciting stand-alone issue which also acts as chapter three of the MULTIVERSITY saga. Join us, if your dare, for THE MULTIVERSITY!

description: â€œGODHEAD,â€ Act 1 Part 5: Guy Gardnerâ€™s at his lowest point in he horrific aftermath of â€œThe Atrocitus War,â€ consumed with rage towards himself for the many lives lost, and heâ€™s taking it out on whomever he can! His actions have caught the attention of Earthâ€™s sole Green Lantern, Simon Baz! Unfortunately, Earth itself has caught the attention of the New God, Malhedron!? But unlike his green compatriot, Guyâ€™s on a rage-filled suicide mission, and heâ€™s just looking for a target!

Superman and Ulysses are still dealing with the traumatic revelations of last issue, but the hunt for The Machinist must continue before his would-be-victims fall into his hands. But what happens when the two heroes learn the truth behind The Machinist and the cost to stopping his mad plan?

description:
The seminal series by Christopher Priest and M.D. Bright collected in its entirety for the very first time â€“ with more than 50 pages of extras and bonus material!

Sometimes the best friends make the worst partners. Once inseparable, childhood friends Eric Henderson and Woody Van Chelton havenâ€™t seen each other in years. Reunited by the mysterious deaths of their research scientist fathers, the unlikely duo find themselves stuck together all over again when a catastrophic lab accident transforms their bodies into pure energy â€“ energy that will completely dissipate if they donâ€™t â€œklang!â€ their control bands together every 24 hours!

Now, armed with an array of high tech gadgetsâ€¦and two horribly mismatched personalitiesâ€¦and a goat for a sidekickâ€¦this pair of misfits has has decided to set the world straight as the worldâ€™s worst superhero team, Quantum and Woodyâ€¦if they can manage to quit fighting each other first.

Now, for the first time in one complete volume, discover the defining masterwork of legendary creators Christopher Priest (Black Panther, Deadpool) and M.D. Bright (Green Lantern, Iron Man) as the complete, classic Quantum and Woody gets the deluxe oversized omnibus treatment!

Collecting QUANTUM AND WOODY (1997) #0, 1â€“21 and #32, THE GOAT: H.A.E.D.U.S. #1, and X-O MANOWAR (1996) #16 (guest-starring Quantum and Woody), as well as the original backup stories from the QUANTUM AND WOODY trade paperback collections, and the never-before-collected story â€œThunk,â€ along with rarely seen sketches, character designs and process art from inside the Valiant vaults!

description:
At the close of INFINITY, Thane discovered he was the son of Thanos and that his touch was death.

Now, accompanied by the constantly whispered advice of the Ebony Maw, he wants to discover his fatherâ€™s history, and his own future.

volume.name: Thanos: A God Up There Listening

description:
X-Force has their sights set on their next target, a mutant who may just hold the key to defeating their greatest adversary: X-MEN: LEGACY #300â€™s ForgetMeNot!

But how can they convince him to join their cause?

And more importantly: How can they hope to find a mutant who slips out of memory whenever he leaves their sight?

After a dangerous encounter with a new enemy, Jaime Sommers finds herself in a strange new place! Trouble lurks around every corner in an idyllic little town, and our heroine is cut off from her O.S.I. support system. What are the bizarre secrets being concealed by the people of North Eden.

Spinning out of the events of CHAOS, the Chosen are a group of monster teens who travel the world with one agenda â€“ hunting other monsters! In this double-shot of horror, action, and humor, the Chosen team up with the powerful witch Suspira to take down Epitaph, a force of evil bent on using three co-eds to help him return from the dead. Then, the Chosen travel to an east coast hamlet to do battle against a strange, ancient monster! Two terrifying tales that explore the darkest corners of the Chaos universe!
name: Death Skull; Beyond the Sea

description:
Richard Henry Benson lives... or does he? Lines blur now between living and dead, between revenge and redemption, between law and justice, as three vastly different powerful heroes are forced to work together to face the explosive, dark alliance between one of The Shadow's most deadly foes, the Voodoo Master, and one of the greatest super-villains in pulp history. When Doc Savage's fortress is suddenly invaded by the Voodoo Master's entranced hordes bearing the destructive weapons of his mysterious evil partner, the Avenger is forced into action for the first time ever in a baptism of fire with zero room for error!

It's war. In the smoking ruins of what was a thriving Spanish village only a few days before, the Spanish patriots and Chumash warriors prepare to fight a well-trained, well-equipped army of German mercenaries. As the battle begins, Lady Zorro and Hugo gallop off on a last-ditch effort to avert the full-on massacre of the defenders. But the evil German general sees through Lady Zorro's plan, and has a bullet for all her troubles. This is the end for Alta California as we know it... and Lady Zorro.

description: A dying emperor has a last request of Sonja. He is throwing the ultimate send-off party, and needs the six greatest artisans from all the known lands: the greatest chef, swordsman, courtesan, and more. If Sonja brings them in time, he will free a thousand slaves...but if she fails, they will be buried alive right next to his coffin! Collects issues #7-12 of the ongoing Red Sonja comic book series, plus the special #0 issue.
name: Volume 2

volume.name: Red Sonja: The Art of Blood and Fire

description:
As Starbuck and Athena face a terrifying enemy under Carillion, and Apollo, Boomer and Jolly face Baltar's Cylonic Giants, the Aethership Galactica heads to Gemini to stop an invasion! But will it be their greatest battle - or their LAST? Come with us on this Steampunk re-imagining of Battlestar Galactica by #1 New York Times bestselling author Tony Lee!

Ben Chambers is a private investigator at the end of his career, an arc best viewed through the bottom of a whiskey bottle. He has investigated missing persons, adulterous lovers, embezzling partners...and none of it has ever meant anything. None of it has ever changed anything. So Ben looks at his life now and wonders, what was it all for, really? He resignedly takes on one last case, investigating the unsolved murder of corporate CEO Jason Black's son, an Iraq veteran killed shortly after an anti-war rally. Ben expected that his investigation would take him into the past through photos and research and interviews. What he never expected was that the trip into earlier years would be literal...as he time travels back to the night of the murder, and discovers that he finally has his chance to make a difference, courtesy of The Twilight Zone.

description: Before Vampirella was marked by the Cult of Chaos as a living sacrifice to Lady Umbra, Queen of Shadows, she worked as an field operative for Cestus Dei, the Vaticanâ€™s version of MI-6. In this one-shot, set before the â€œOur Lady of Shadowsâ€ story arc (from Vampirella #1-6), Vampirella must go undercover at a French convent to investigate a series of weird deaths and odd disappearances believed to be the work of a long-dead evil witch known as Metifa, Satanâ€™s Mistress. Thatâ€™s right â€“ one of the classic Warren-era menaces makes her modern age debut, with bestselling horror author Nancy A. Collins at the helm!
name: Prelude to Shadows; Lurker in the Deep

description: After far too little time together, Cray and his Students part waysâ€”the latter setting off to storm the warlord Kavanaugh's sandship, the former having booked passage back to Earth. But along the way, the reluctant warrior is faced with a choice. Will he follow the path before him, or follow the code he has lived by... to almost certain death?

Everyone's favorite boy-genius returns to comics! Dexter has reached the pinnacle of his greatest scientific experimentâ€”one that will gift him with infinite clarity and superhuman intellect beyond all mankind. But with every precaution in place, will he be able to finish it before his meddling sister Dee Dee ruins everythingâ€¦ AGAIN?
name: Volume One
